#define DLINMIN
#define SIGN(a, b)   ((b) >= 0.0 ? fabs(a) : -fabs(a))
 Just used to override the standard definition.

Detailed Description

Offers the Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno algorithm for the optimization of models.
